cannotdownloadfiles: File downloading is disabled in your Mobile service, the app can't work with this setting disabled. Please, contact your site administrator.
credentialsdescription: Please provide your username and password to login on
confirmdeletesite: Are you sure you want to delete the site {{sitename}}?
erroraccesscontrolalloworigin: The Cross-Origin call you're trying to perform has been rejected. Please check the online help file
errordeletesite: An error occurred while deleting this site. Please try again.
errorupdatesite: An error ocurred while updating the site's token.
helpmeloginend: To test the app in a Metabolic Direct demo site type coach or Member in the Site URL field and click the Add button.
helpmeloginintro: This app can only connect to Metabolic Direct site that have specifically enabled Mobile app access.
helpmeloginmid: If you can't connect to site then you need to contact administrator
invalidaccount: Please check your login details or ask your site administrator to check the site configuration.
invalidmoodleversion: Invalid version. The minium version required is 2.4.
logininsiterequired: You need to log in to the site in a browser window.
mobileservicesnotenabled: Mobile Services are not enabled in your site. Please, contact your Metabolic Direct site administrator if you think mobile access should be enabled.
newsitedescription: Please enter the URL. Note that it might not be configured to work with this app.
notloggedin: You need to be logged in.
reconnectdescription: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you have to reconnect to the site.
reconnectssodescription: Your authentication token is invalid or has expired, you have to reconnect to the site. You need to log in to the site in a browser window.
siteinmaintenance: Your site is in maintenance mode
siteurlrequired: Site URL required, i.e http://www.metabolicdirect.com or https://www.metabolicdirect.com
webservicesnotenabled: Web Services are not enabled in your site. Please, contact your site administrator if you think mobile access should be enabled.
